title: Forecast CAGR global digital health market by major segment 2015 to 2020
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Name, and a y axis representing Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020.
The highest category is found at Mobile_health where Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is 41.0.
The lowest category is found at EHR/EMR where Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is 4.0.
